price: 5. Je crains (le comportement de) mes proches après (ma mort) et ma femme est stérile. Veuille donc, de Ta part, me faire don d’un descendant,
arabic: وَإِنِّي خِفۡتُ ٱلۡمَوَٰلِيَ مِن وَرَآءِي وَكَانَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتِي عَاقِرٗا فَهَبۡ لِي مِن لَّدُنكَ وَلِيّٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-innī khif'tu al-mawāliya min warāī wakānati im'ra-atī ʿāqiran fahab lī min ladunka waliyyan
